scripts.remove_dist: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); try{ fs.rmdirSync('./dist/', { recursive: true }) } catch{}; process.exit(0);"
scripts.remove_build: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); try{ fs.rmdirSync('./build/', { recursive: true }) } catch{}; process.exit(0);"
scripts.build_library: npm run remove_build && tsc --build tsconfig.build_main.json && tsc --build tsconfig.build_server.json && tsc --build tsconfig.build_client.json && npm pack && mkdir -p ./build/ && mv *.tgz ./build/
scripts.build: npm audit && npm run build_tsc && npm run check && npm run build_library
